column1: This year I switched up my normal routine and voted early. It was great—no long lines and lots of room to maintain social distance.  It has been amazing to see how well @HarrisVotes and #TX07 have turned out the vote but we're not done yet.  Get out there and #VoteEarly! https://t.co/t50dqOkATE

Right now the last thing #TX07 families should have to worry about is affording the health care they need—whether for COVID-19 or for their pre-existing conditions.  I've been working in Congress to protect coverage—because it's never been more important. https://t.co/TCEcrPVznU

While you're working here in Houston I'm working in Washington to support our economy in these difficult times.  Energy jobs are vital to our region—that's why I fought to make sure they were included in COVID-19 relief programs. #TX07  https://t.co/5zt3nmVEpf

Small businesses in #TX07 have weathered so much in recent years—hurricanes floods and now COVID-19. Many paying back CARES Act loans are still paying back disaster loans too.  I'm glad to lead a bipartisan coalition to help them in the LIFT UP Act covered on @FOX26Houston: https://t.co/YVLSJYKxVb

If you or someone you have been in contact with are particularly vulnerable to coronavirus or have experienced coronavirus symptoms in the past 14 days we ask that you skip this opportunity. We look forward to connecting with you virtually.
